data.actual_result: It still redirects you to either of these pages and the message will close itself.
data.short_description: Tapping outage icon in the connection problem message still redirects you to either discord status or twitter.
data.steps_to_repro: - Obtain the connection problem message - Tap the outage icon. Does nothing.  - Tap any of the links in the connection problem message. Go back to discord afterwards. - Tap the outage icon. Observe.
